Summary: I saw a disk shaped object hovering in the air. 50 feet in front of me and 25 to 30 feet above land.
trends: There have been 48 other sightings in Aurora
There were no other sightings in Aurora on or around August 29th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was leaving work when i notice an object in the air that had a red light, blue light and a strobe\pulsating white light. we do have airports around so my first thought was an airplane with a weird strobe light on it. as i was heading towards it, it seem to be lower in the sky and hovered next to the park about 50 feet from me and 25 to 30 feet above land. i stopped my vehicle to get a better look. it was disk shaped and there was no sound coming from it. it seemed like a prob of some sort.i was excited to finally see something i could not explain, but almost didn't believe what i was seeing. i got out of my vehicle to get a better look and to take a picture, but when i exited my vehicle, it took off. it was going about 35 to 40 mph. heading northwest. i watched it for another couple of minute when i lost sight of it.
